lines.text: Maybe... that hole isn't as deep as it looks.
What if he just used that candle to burn a little fake bullet hole in his skin?
...Moreover, there's no way he'd be able to do that without singin' the robe around it.
Maybe he took the robe off first, and just cut a hole in it to match!
Still, that hole's way too tidy to be some kind of burn mark.
...This has to have a simpler answer.
